tests.title: For valid options MUST return a valid signature string.
tests.fullTitle: Canonicalize Signature String For valid options MUST return a valid signature string.

tests.title: If a value is not the last value then append an ASCII newline.
tests.fullTitle: Canonicalize Signature String If a value is not the last value then append an ASCII newline.

tests.title:
The client MUST use the values of each HTTP header field
        in the headers Signature Parameter, in the order they appear
        in the headers Signature Parameter.
tests.fullTitle:
Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter The client MUST use the values of each HTTP header field
        in the headers Signature Parameter, in the order they appear
        in the headers Signature Parameter.

tests.title:
All header field values associated with the header field
        MUST be concatenated, separated by an ASCII comma and an ASCII space,
        and used in the order in which they will appear in the
        transmitted HTTP message.
tests.fullTitle:
Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter All header field values associated with the header field
        MUST be concatenated, separated by an ASCII comma and an ASCII space,
        and used in the order in which they will appear in the
        transmitted HTTP message.

tests.title:
If a header specified in the headers parameter cannot be
        matched with a provided header in the message, the implementation
        MUST produce an error.
tests.fullTitle:
Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter If a header specified in the headers parameter cannot be
        matched with a provided header in the message, the implementation
        MUST produce an error.

tests.title:
If a header specified in the headers parameter is
        malformed the implementation MUST produce an error.
tests.fullTitle:
Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter If a header specified in the headers parameter is
        malformed the implementation MUST produce an error.

tests.title:
If the header value is a zero-length string,
          the signature string line correlating with
          that header will simply be the (lowercased) header name,
          an ASCII colon :, and an ASCII space.
tests.fullTitle:
Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter If the header value is a zero-length string,
          the signature string line correlating with
          that header will simply be the (lowercased) header name,
          an ASCII colon :, and an ASCII space.

tests.title: SHOULD change capitalized Headers to lowercase.
tests.fullTitle: Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter SHOULD change capitalized Headers to lowercase.

tests.title:
If the header field name is (request-target) then generate
          the header field value by concatenating the lowercased :method,
          an ASCII space, and the :path pseudo-headers.
tests.fullTitle:
Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter If the header field name is (request-target) then generate
          the header field value by concatenating the lowercased :method,
          an ASCII space, and the :path pseudo-headers.

tests.title: SHOULD return "" if the headers paramter is empty.
tests.fullTitle: Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter SHOULD return "" if the headers paramter is empty.

tests.title:
If the header parameter is not specified, implementations
        MUST operate as if the field were specified with a single
        value, (created), in the list of HTTP headers.
tests.fullTitle:
Canonicalize Signature String Header Parameter If the header parameter is not specified, implementations
        MUST operate as if the field were specified with a single
        value, (created), in the list of HTTP headers.

tests.title: MUST require keyId.
tests.fullTitle: Sign MUST require keyId.

tests.title:
A client MUST generate a signature by base 64 encoding
      the output of the digital signature algorithm.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign A client MUST generate a signature by base 64 encoding
      the output of the digital signature algorithm.

tests.title:
A client MUST use the headers and algorithm values as
      well as the contents of the HTTP message,
      to create the signature string.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign A client MUST use the headers and algorithm values as
      well as the contents of the HTTP message,
      to create the signature string.

tests.title:
A client MUST use the key associated with keyId to 
      generate a digital signature on the
      signature string.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign A client MUST use the key associated with keyId to 
      generate a digital signature on the
      signature string.

tests.title:
MUST be able to discover metadata
      about the key from the keyId.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign MUST be able to discover metadata
      about the key from the keyId.

tests.title:
MUST NOT process a signature with a
      created timestamp value that is in the future.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign MUST NOT process a signature with a
      created timestamp value that is in the future.

tests.title:
MUST NOT process a signature with an expires
      timestamp value that is in the past.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign MUST NOT process a signature with an expires
      timestamp value that is in the past.

tests.title:
MUST produce an error if algorithm
        parameter differs from key metadata.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign Algorithm Parameter MUST produce an error if algorithm
        parameter differs from key metadata.

tests.title:
Signature scheme MUST be in the
        HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.
tests.fullTitle:
Sign Algorithm Parameter Signature scheme MUST be in the
        HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.

tests.title: MUST sign for algorithm hs2019.
tests.fullTitle: Sign Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST sign for algorithm hs2019.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.
tests.fullTitle: Sign Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.
tests.fullTitle: Sign Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.
tests.fullTitle: Sign Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.
tests.fullTitle: Sign Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.

tests.title: MUST require a signature parameter.
tests.fullTitle: Verify MUST require a signature parameter.

tests.title:
MUST derive the digital signature algorithm from 
      the metadata associated with the keyId.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify MUST derive the digital signature algorithm from 
      the metadata associated with the keyId.

tests.title:
MUST NOT use the value of
      algorithm from the signed message.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify MUST NOT use the value of
      algorithm from the signed message.

tests.title:
A server MUST use the received HTTP message, the headers value,
      and the Signature String Construction algorithm
      to recreate the signature.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify A server MUST use the received HTTP message, the headers value,
      and the Signature String Construction algorithm
      to recreate the signature.

tests.title:
A server MUST use the algorithm, keyId, and base 64
      decoded signature listed in the Signature Parameters
      to verify the authenticity of the digital signature.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify A server MUST use the algorithm, keyId, and base 64
      decoded signature listed in the Signature Parameters
      to verify the authenticity of the digital signature.

tests.title:
If a header specified in the headers value of
      the Signature Parameters (or the default item (created)
      where the headers value is not supplied) is absent from the message,
      the implementation MUST produce an error.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify If a header specified in the headers value of
      the Signature Parameters (or the default item (created)
      where the headers value is not supplied) is absent from the message,
      the implementation MUST produce an error.

tests.title:
MUST be able to discover metadata about the key from the keyId
      such that they can determine the type of digital signature algorithm
      to employ when verifying signatures.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify MUST be able to discover metadata about the key from the keyId
      such that they can determine the type of digital signature algorithm
      to employ when verifying signatures.

tests.title: MUST have a keyId parameter.
tests.fullTitle: Verify MUST have a keyId parameter.

tests.title: MUST have a signature parameter.
tests.fullTitle: Verify MUST have a signature parameter.

tests.title:
MUST produce an error if algorithm
        parameter differs from key metadata.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify Algorithm Parameter MUST produce an error if algorithm
        parameter differs from key metadata.

tests.title:
Signature scheme MUST be in the
        HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.
tests.fullTitle:
Verify Algorithm Parameter Signature scheme MUST be in the
        HTTP Signatures Algorithms Registry.

tests.title: MUST sign for algorithm hs2019.
tests.fullTitle: Verify Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST sign for algorithm hs2019.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.
tests.fullTitle: Verify Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha1.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.
tests.fullTitle: Verify Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm rsa-sha256.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.
tests.fullTitle: Verify Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm hmac-sha256.

tests.title: MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.
tests.fullTitle: Verify Algorithm Parameter signature scheme MUST reject deprecated algorithm ecdsa-sha256.
